import React from "react"; const AboutSection: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Heading */}

Welcome to my professional full-stack dev portfolio!

{/* Content */}
{/* Text Section */}

Hey, I'm Steven! I'm primarily a backend developer who thrives on building scalable, efficient, and reliable systems. My go-to tools for full-stack development are ASP.NET Core and React, which I use to craft robust APIs and full-stack applications that prioritize functionality, performance, and clean architecture.

While I've dabbled in the front-end using technologies like React and Blazor, my true passion lies in crafting solid backend architectures. On the Python side, Django is one of my favorites for quickly setting up clean and maintainable backends. I also have experience with Unity3D for game development, where I focus more on the technical side of creating interactive experiences rather than the artistic elements.

Other skills include working with Docker as well as Kubernetes for containerization. I have used MS Azure services for cloud-focused solutions. EFCore + SQLServer as well as PostgreSQL are my go-to DB tools. I'm proficient in using CLI's such as PowerShell and GitBash, and I am also well-versed in using GitHub for version control.

I'm all about solving problems with robust solutions. Whether I'm working on a complex API, optimizing database queries, or improving system performance, my focus is always on creating something scalable, maintainable, and efficient.

Currently, I'm seeking on-site or hybrid opportunities in major cities such as Cape Town, Johannesburg, and Pretoria, any of which I'm willing to relocate to. I'm also open to remote work â€” highly organized, independent, and always ready to adapt.

{/* Avatar Section */}
); }; export default AboutSection;
